pullRequest.title: Use `io.netty.recycler.ratio` directly
pullRequest.bodyText:
Motivation


It's inable to collect all object because RATIO is always >=1 after
safeFindNextPositivePowerOfTwo


Enable drop object in WeakOrderQueue(commit:
71860e5) enlarge the drop ratio. We
can subtly control the overall drop ratio by using io.netty.recycler.ratio directly,


Modification

Remove safeFindNextPositivePowerOfTwo before set the ratio

Results
Able to disable drop when recycle object

nodes.bodyText: as the ratio is used with bitmask operations we need to have it either be 0 or have it be a power of two. So this change and the one below is not correct

commit.message:
Use `io.netty.recycler.ratio` directly

Motivation

1. It's inable to collect all object because RATIO is always >=1 after
`safeFindNextPositivePowerOfTwo`

2. Enable drop object in `WeakOrderQueue`(commit:
71860e5b94dbc665fdb8d279d3780d6fe1c618ea) enlarge the drop ratio. We
can subtly control the overall drop ratio by using `io.netty.recycler.ratio` directly,

Modification

- Remove `safeFindNextPositivePowerOfTwo` before set the ratio

Results

Able to disable drop when recycle object
